thoughts.content: Imagination is more important than knowledge
thoughts.author: Albert Einstein

thoughts.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
thoughts.author: Steve Jobs

thoughts.content: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower
thoughts.author: Steve Jobs

thoughts.content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
thoughts.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

thoughts.content: The best way to predict the future is to create it
thoughts.author: Abraham Lincoln

thoughts.content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today
thoughts.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

thoughts.content: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
thoughts.author: Mark Twain

thoughts.content: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going
thoughts.author: Sam Levenson
